flawed_nl_solution:
After the first segment, there are 100 - 10 = <<100-10=90>>90 racers left in the race.
After the second segment, 90 / 3 = <<90/3=30>>30 racers are eliminated.
This leaves 90 - 30 = <<90-30=56>>56 racers to compete in the third segment.
After the third segment, 56 / 2 = <<56/2=28>>28 more racers are eliminated.
This leaves 56 - 28 = <<56-28=28>>28 racers to run in the final section of the race.
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 56. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
